nodes.text: Prevaro was a Rodian with information of interest to Azool, whom he believed to be Prince Xizor in disguise.

Prevaro attacked Azool, who revealed that she was actually Savan, Xizor's niece. She made Prevaro her lieutenant. Later, she took Prevaro with her to Hurd's Moon on a mission to capture the Human replica droid Guri, who had gone rogue after Xizor's death. They determined that Guri had gone to the scientist Massad Thrumble, and Prevaro gathered a group of thugs to help capture her.
While Savan confronted Guri, Prevaro encountered the Heroes of Yavin, including Luke Skywalker, who cut off his right hand.
